ComicInfo.Title: Tales from the Old Back-Hoe Operator! - The Gross Horror!; Space Case; Freddy the Barbarian; G.I. Freddy; True Romances; Superfat Freddy; Frederick The Duck; Paradise Revisited

The comic contains the following short stories and comics:
Tales From The Old Back-Hoe OperatorSpace CaseFreddy The BarbarianG.I. FreddyFat Freddy's True RomancesSuperfat FreddyFrederick The duckFat Freddy's Cat in "Paradise Revisited"Lifetime SubscriptionHitch Your Wagon to a Chicken
